WASHINGTON, Feb. 7( UPI)-- Former U.S. Defense Secretary href="http://www.upi.com/topic/Donald Rumsfeld_Donald Rumsfeld/" title="Donald Rumsfeld_Donald Rumsfeld"> Donald Rumsfeld is conceding`` it's possible'' too few troops were sent to invade Iraq. In a war, many things cost lives, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC in an interview to be broadcast on`` Nightline'' Monday. George W. Bush has written that the troop level in Iraq was`` the most important failure in the execution of the war.''
